resources.Resource description: A food pack for a family of 5-6 members. Family food packages should conform to the Required Dietary Allowance (RDA) of an individual which is 2,100k/cal/adult/day and 1,700k/cal/child per day, micronutrient, Vit A for 6-11 months old infants 100,000 I.U. and for 12-59 months old children-200,000 I.U. Some of the required foods are as follows: 3 kilos of rice, 9 canned goods (sardines/canned meat), 6 noodles, 6 pcs. 3 in one coffee or its nutritional alternative i.e. bread.
resources.Readable sentence: A food pack for a family of 5-6 members. Family food packages should conform to the Required Dietary Allowance (RDA) of an individual which is 2,100k/cal/adult/day and 1,700k/cal/child per day, micronutrient, Vit A for 6-11 months old infants 100,000 I.U. and for 12-59 months old children-200,000 I.U. Some of the required foods are as follows: 3 kilos of rice, 9 canned goods (sardines/canned meat), 6 noodles, 6 pcs. 3 in one coffee or its nutritional alternative i.e. bread.

resources.Resource description: 1 kit per family good for 30 days. 12 bars of bath soap (135 g), 4 bars of laundry soap (380 g), Toothbrush, Toothpaste (150ml), Toenail cutter, Sanitary napkins, Face towel, Bath towel/malong, Plastic dipper plastic pail with cover, Slippers, Underwear.
resources.Readable sentence: 1 kit per family good for 30 days. 12 bars of bath soap (135 g), 4 bars of laundry soap (380 g), Toothbrush, Toothpaste (150ml), Toenail cutter, Sanitary napkins, Face towel, Bath towel/malong, Plastic dipper plastic pail with cover, Slippers, Underwear.

resources.Resource description: 1 kit per family.  Mats/beddings, Blankets, Mosquito nets, stove and kitchen wares ( glass cup and saucer, spoon, fork, ladle, frying pan kettle, casserole), etc.
resources.Readable sentence: 1 kit per family.  Mats/beddings, Blankets, Mosquito nets, stove and kitchen wares ( glass cup and saucer, spoon, fork, ladle, frying pan kettle, casserole), etc.

resources.Resource description: 1 kit per family good for 30 days.  Jerry can (20 liters with faucet), Hyposol (1) 100 ml/bottle or aquatabs/pura tabs (67 mg/20 liter 30 tabs).
resources.Readable sentence: 1 kit per family good for 30 days.  Jerry can (20 liters with faucet), Hyposol (1) 100 ml/bottle or aquatabs/pura tabs (67 mg/20 liter 30 tabs).

resources.Resource description: Drinking and food. 2.5-3 liters per person per day.
resources.Readable sentence: Drinking and food. 2.5-3 liters per person per day.

resources.Resource description: Basic hygiene paractices and cooking needs. 5-12 liters per person per day.
resources.Readable sentence: Basic hygiene paractices and cooking needs. 5-12 liters per person per day.

resources.Resource name: Minimum Water demand for prolonged period
resources.Resource description: Drinking, food preparation and cooking, bathing, laundry, sanitation and hygiene. 52 liters per person per day.
resources.Readable sentence: Drinking, food preparation and cooking, bathing, laundry, sanitation and hygiene. 52 liters per person per day.

resources.Resource description: Short-term displacement (1/50 person), Long term displacement (1/20 person). 4 female toilets for every 3 male toilets. 1 in 10 should be PWD accessible.
resources.Readable sentence: Short-term displacement (1/50 person), Long term displacement (1/20 person). 4 female toilets for every 3 male toilets. 1 in 10 should be PWD accessible.

resources.Resource description: CFS are open spaces for outdoor play activities. 1 facility for every 100 families.  6x7 m floor area with toilets.
resources.Readable sentence: CFS are open spaces for outdoor play activities. 1 facility for every 100 families.  6x7 m floor area with toilets.

resources.Resource description: 1 hand basin per 10 persons. 1 wash bench (4-5 m) per 100 persons. 2 laundry platform per 100 persons.
resources.Readable sentence: 1 hand basin per 10 persons. 1 wash bench (4-5 m) per 100 persons. 2 laundry platform per 100 persons.

resources.Resource description: 15 litres of water per person/day. 500 meters between individual shelters and water supply. 250 persons per functioning water tap.
resources.Readable sentence: 15 litres of water per person/day. 500 meters between individual shelters and water supply. 250 persons per functioning water tap.

provenance: Philippine Minimum Needs for InaSAFE * , * Guidelines on Evacuation Center Coordination and Management Joint Memorandom Circular No. __ Series of 2013, ** A family is composed of 5-6 members
